hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | grep -qE '(^|/)\.env$' && echo 'BLOCKED: .env files contain secrets and must never be read directly. Use environment variables or .env.example as a reference.' >&2 && exit 2; exit 0

git --git-dir=$HOME/dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME fetch --quiet 2>/dev/null; BEHIND=$(git --git-dir=$HOME/dotfiles/ --work-tree=$HOME log HEAD..@{u} --oneline 2>/dev/null | wc -l); if [ "$BEHIND" -gt 0 ]; then echo "Dotfiles are $BEHIND commit(s) behind remote. Run: dotfile-config pull"; fi; exit 0
